description:
Running Rev 1172 of Nova, get the following error when initiating builds in Scheduler logs:

2011-06-14 04:18:29,725 DEBUG nova.rpc [-] Making asynchronous cast on compute.compute-10-13-0-223... from (pid=15798) cast /usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/rpc.py:548
2011-06-14 04:18:29,726 ERROR nova.scheduler.manager [-] Driver Method schedule_run_instance missing: 'ChanceScheduler' object has no attribute 'schedule_run_instance'
(nova.scheduler.manager): TRACE: Traceback (most recent call last):
(nova.scheduler.manager): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/scheduler/manager.py", line 89, in _schedule
(nova.scheduler.manager): TRACE:     host = getattr(self.driver, driver_method)(elevated, *args,
(nova.scheduler.manager): TRACE: AttributeError: 'ChanceScheduler' object has no attribute 'schedule_run_instance'
(nova.scheduler.manager): TRACE:
title: ChanceScheduler object has no attribute schedule_run_instance

comments.content:
Hmm, that should probably be a LOG.info instead of LOG.exception.

Vish

comments.content:
Sorry, I introduced that in dist-sched-3 branch.

Fixed up in dist-sched-4 ... awaiting merge :)
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~sandy-walsh

comments.content: dist-sched-4 was merged, so this should be fixed. Please set back to "Confirmed" if that's not the case.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx
